title: Border, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Shaped border of Point d'Alençon with repeated undulating forms connected by stylized garland. Fond: bride tortillée. Modes: enchainettes, point mignon, mosaique.
